Operation 'findForms' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is incomplete - it doesn't mention the search/filter capability. Enhanced version clarifies the search functionality, specifies accepted query types, and explains the response format for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Returns all VA Forms and their last revision date
data.current_description: Returns an index of all available VA forms. Optionally, pass a query parameter to filter forms by form number or title.
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve VA forms with optional filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves an index of all available VA forms from the VA Form Repository. Supports optional query parameter to filter forms by form number, keyword, or title. Returns a FormsIndex response containing form listings with metadata including last revision dates. Use this endpoint to search for forms or retrieve the complete catalog of available forms.
data.reasoning: Original summary is incomplete - it doesn't mention the search/filter capability. Description lacks clarity about what the query parameter accepts (only mentions form number and title, but API context indicates keyword search is also supported). Missing output details about the response structure. Enhanced version clarifies the search functionality, specifies accepted query types, and explains the response format for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'findFormByFormName' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the comprehensive nature of the response. Description is vague about what 'full revision history' includes and doesn't explain the response structure or use case. Missing context about important metadata fields (SHA256, PDF validity, deletion status) that are critical for AI agents to understand the operation's value. Enhanced version specifies the response schema, details what revision history contains, and clarifies when to use this endpoint versus the search endpoint.

data.current_description: Returns a single form and the full revision history
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve form details and complete revision history
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed metadata for a specific VA form identified by its form name, including the full revision history with SHA256 checksums and PDF change dates. Returns a FormShow response containing form information such as number of pages, related forms, benefit categories, language, valid PDF link status, and deletion status if applicable. Use this endpoint when you need comprehensive form details beyond basic search results.
